revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=WPB3000 |revision= |asin= |manuf_country=China |manuf=SGE |manuf_model=GPN2.8P61A |manuf_rev=-C |availability= |type=Powerline Access Point, extender |fcc_date=10/17/2013 |fcc_id=LNQWPB3000 |ic_id=2496A-WPB3000 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.15 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Atheros |cpu2_model=AR7420 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Actiontec-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Actiontec-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Powerline Wireless Network Extender}}
"GPN2.8P61A-C_WIFI_PCB-ACTION", "REV: 1.0", "TB49193B0 B7", a RoHS logo, :and a date code of '''1328''' appears to be silkscreened on the ''main'' board :(Wi-Fi / Ethernet - non-Power/PLC) in the FCC photos.
Per the FCC photos, this device is using the following... *[[Atheros]] AR7420-AL3C (PLC SoC) *[[Atheros]] AR9341-AL1A (WiSoC) :at least one ''Airgain'' N2420S antenna
Default settings are from the FCC manual. They may be inaccurate.
*The sample SSID shown in the manual is '''[[Actiontec]]'''. *The sample label indicates the format is '''Actiontec-XXXX'''.. :but that could certianly be inaccurate too..
__NOTOC__
